title: Bloomberg Markets:  Schwedel on `the Firm of the Future'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets:  Schwedel on `the Firm of the Future'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Andrew Schwedel Partner, Senior Member of Financial Services and Head of Macro Trends Bain & Company Discussing five themes the “firm of the future” must adopt to be successful in the next 10 years and what the next generation of successful companies will look like.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
